p: For curative or palliative care, several cost-effectiveness studies have been conducted on respiratory conditions, such as asthma interventions, 45, 46 allergic rhinitis testing methods, 47 immunotherapy, 48 and drugs. 49, 50 For example, the cost per QALY of treating grass allergen with GRAZAX ® ranged between €12,930 and €18,263 in seven northern European countries. 49
